channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: Expedia 首席执行官辞职，航空旅行疲软导致股价下滑
item.description: Expedia CEO resigns, shares slump on air travel softness reut.rs/49sUSeP

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：在激进投资者的压力下，迪斯尼公司的鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）到处挥舞着闪亮的招牌。然而，第一季度的业绩却缺乏亮点。詹妮弗-萨巴（Jennifer Saba）解释了《堡垒之夜》的股份和泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的加入如何无法解决核心业务问题。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: Disney's Bob Iger under pressure from activist investors is waving around lots of shiny objects. The first-quarter results, however, lack spark. Jennifer Saba explains how a Fortnite stake and enlisting Taylor Swift can't solve core business problems

item.title: 华尔街主要股指周四上涨，基准标普 500 指数连续创收盘纪录新高，原因是投资者消化了收益情况
item.description: Wall Street's major indexes rose Thursday, with the benchmark S&P 500 extending its record closing high streak as investors digest earnings reut.rs/3uvBDCH

item.title: 观看：白银已成为埃及的新黄金，它是埃及经济危机的标志
item.description: WATCH: Silver has become the new gold in Egypt and it's a sign of the country's economic crisis reut.rs/3SSviJR

item.title: 雇主交易为博雅银行赢得超过 100 亿美元的存款和投资
item.description: Employer deals earn BofA more than $10 bln in deposits, investments reut.rs/48Zn7lD

item.title: 观看：糖果巨头好时宣布了一项为期两年的新重组计划，并称该计划将产生约 3 亿美元的税前节余，随后好时股价跳涨近 8%。
item.description: WATCH: Shares of Hershey jumped as much as nearly 8% after the confectionery giant announced a new two-year restructuring program that it said would generate about $300 million in pre-tax savings reut.rs/4bxBboc $HSY

item.title: 聚焦：巴克莱银行首席执行官文卡特准备改革，投资者渴望更简单的银行
item.description: Focus: Barclays investors crave simpler bank as CEO Venkat prepares revamp reut.rs/4bzLzeX

item.title: 全球债权人就减免最贫困人口债务问题质询评级机构
item.description: Global creditors quiz ratings agencies over debt relief to the poorest reut.rs/3St283A

item.title: 观看：日本日产汽车公司公布的 12 月季度营业利润增长 6.4%，低于预期。
item.description: WATCH: Japan's Nissan Motor posted a lower-than-expected 6.4% rise in operating profit in the December quarter, saying it will maintain its annual outlook as a more profitable product mix offset a lower full-year vehicle sales forecast reut.rs/3HTFXi0

item.title: 高盛因期货交易收费问题面临调查 - 彭博新闻社
item.description: Goldman Sachs faces probe over fees charged for futures trading- Bloomberg News reut.rs/3SRut4R

item.title: 美国议员指责风险投资公司资助与中国军方有关联的公司
item.description: US lawmakers accuse VC firms of funding Chinese military-linked firms reut.rs/3wbfp9t

item.title: 受投资组合公司业绩回升的推动，日本软银集团五个季度以来首次实现盈利，净收入达 66 亿美元。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Japan’s SoftBank Group posted its first profit in five quarters with $6.6 billion net income, buoyed by an upturn in portfolio companies. More here: reut.rs/3wb3lVT

item.title: 威瑞信第四季度收入超出预期，原因是互联网服务需求强劲
item.description: Verisign beats fourth-quarter revenue estimates on strong internet services demand reut.rs/3wkJG5C

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：鲍勃-艾格正在招募泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift），并以 15 亿美元入股《堡垒之夜》的所有者，以回击笼中的响尾蛇。但这些举措无法掩盖包括传统电视和流媒体服务在内的核心业务存在的问题，@jennifersaba 解释道。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: Bob Iger is enlisting Taylor Swift and taking a $1.5 billion stake in Fortnite's owner to fight back cage rattlers. But those moves can't paper over the problems with the core business including traditional TV and streaming services, explains @jennifersaba

item.title: 观看：Alphabet、Meta Platforms 和 Netflix 公布的财报喜忧参半，导致股价大幅波动。奥本海默资产管理公司的约翰-斯托尔茨福斯将目光投向波动之外
item.description: WATCH: Alphabet, Meta Platforms and Netflix reported mixed earnings, resulting in huge swings in their stock prices. Oppenheimer Asset Management's John Stoltzfus looks beyond the volatility reut.rs/49x8ZQx

item.title: 加拿大阳光人寿在大屠杀中看到了商业地产的长期机遇
item.description: Canada's Sun Life sees long-term opportunities in commercial real estate amid carnage reut.rs/49rDgjI

item.title: Expedia 任命新首席执行官
item.description: Expedia names new CEO reut.rs/42xRSeV

item.title: 观看：埃及经济危机的一个迹象出现在贵金属领域，卖家称人们在购买传统礼物时选择银饰而非黄金
item.description: WATCH: One sign of Egypt's economic crisis is popping up in precious metals, where sellers say people are opting for silver jewelry instead of gold for traditional gifts reut.rs/3SSviJR

item.title: 工会称 Monte Paschi 将在年底前招聘 300 名员工
item.description: Monte Paschi to hire 300 staff by year-end, union says reut.rs/49uIgnu

item.title: 观看：好时公司概述了一项为期两年的新重组计划，其中涉及裁员，在预计年销售额和利润低于华尔街预期后，该计划将产生约 3 亿美元的税前节余 $HSY
item.description: WATCH: Hershey outlined a new two-year restructuring program involving job cuts that would generate about $300 million in pre-tax savings after projecting annual sales and profit below Wall Street expectations reut.rs/4bxBboc $HSY

item.title: 印度 LIC 因股东资金转移增加而实现第三季度利润增长
item.description: India's LIC posts Q3 profit rise on higher shareholders' fund transfer reut.rs/3UyhExC

item.description: Breakingviews - EU’s AI ambitions may fail on two fronts reut.rs/3UCjrlp reut.rs/3UCjrlp

item.title: 日本日产汽车公司将本财年的零售销量预期从之前的 370 万辆下调至 355 万辆，此前该公司在 12 月季度公布的营业利润增幅为 6.4%，低于预期。
item.description: Japan's Nissan Motor revised its retail sales outlook for the current financial year down to 3.55 million vehicles from 3.7 million it had expected previously, after it posted a lower-than-expected 6.4% rise in operating profit in the December quarter reut.rs/3HTFXi0
